com.linkedin.helix.controller.stages
Class StatsAggregationStage

java.lang.Object
  com.linkedin.helix.controller.pipeline.AbstractBaseStage
      com.linkedin.helix.controller.stages.StatsAggregationStage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Stage
public class StatsAggregationStage
extends AbstractBaseStage

For each LiveInstances select currentState and message whose sessionId matches sessionId from LiveInstance Get Partition,State for all the resources computed in previous State [ResourceComputationStage]

Author:
asilbers
